Frankfurt, June 12 (finanztreff.de) - Analyst Nick James of Panmure Zombie reiterates his "buy" rating on BOERSE INVEST BETEI (BJ5N.F, 797639).  BOERSE INVEST BETEI develops its market of its services. The offices of the company appear in Russia and in Asian countries. Because of this fact the interest  of the investors is growing. The information has appeared in the press that GERRESHEIMER (WKN A0LD6E) has already announced the forthcoming purchase of 49% of shares of the company BOERSE INVEST BETEI, that's why small investors have big chances to obtain an enormous gain. The forthcoming purchase is planned for May 15 2007. Though the financial details of the transaction aren't exposed, the presumable sum makes 1,8 mln Euro. The analyst Nick James noticed that the quotation increase will make 70%. BOERSE INVEST BETEI is likely to return additional capital to its shareholders going forward, the analysts add.
